title: Acompli, Sunrise, and Wunderlist (w/ Kurt DelBene)
heading: Season 1, Episode 8
description: Ben and David have special guest Kurt DelBene on to discuss Microsoft's acquisition of Acompli, Sunrise, and Wunderlist. Kurt is the EVP of Corporate Strategy and Planning at Microsoft, and joins to discuss Microsoft's cloud-first, mobile-first strategy, and the importance of being cross-platform in the modern era. They cover:
